todos.title: Lookup Tables
todos.body: Used to determine whether a text is part of a category or is an alias of another text.

todos.title: Blacklists and Whitelists
todos.body: Used to determine spam and unwanted text.

todos.title: Stemming
todos.body: Plural replaced by singular.

todos.title: Data Science Tools
todos.body: Java, MapReduce, R, Hadoop, Python, NoSQL.

todos.title: Granger Causality Test
todos.body: Cross correlation.

todos.title: Bumpiness
todos.body: Bumpiness is linked to how the data points are ordered, while centrality and volatility completely ignore order. So, bumpiness is useful for datasets where order matters, in particular time series. Also, bumpiness integrates the notion of dependence (among the data points), while centrality and variance do not.

todos.title: Natural Language Processing
todos.body: Analyzing unstructured data.

todos.body: Analytics engineering, data shaping, art of optimization, optimization science, data intelligence, business optimization.

todos.body: Would a ninety year old lady buy a motorcycle at 2 am in the morning.

todos.title: Stopwords
todos.body: Words that connect such as the, or, and, of from, about, it.

todos.title: Predictive Analytics
todos.body: What will happen.

todos.title: Descriptive Analytics
todos.body: What happened and why.

todos.title: Extreme Events
todos.body: Using Monte Carlo to predict fraud by detecting extreme events unlikely to naturally occur.

todos.title: Schools
todos.body: UC Berkeley, CUNY

todos.title: Decision Trees
todos.body: Tree like graph model to determine decisions and their possible outcomes, avoid large trees and use small decision trees.

todos.title: Normalizing Text
todos.body: Tokens rearranged in alphabetical order and sorted.

todos.title: Synonym Tables
todos.body: To determine if words are the same or similar enough as other words and should be merged.

todos.title: Taxonomy
todos.body: The output of a clustering algorithm.

todos.title: Data Dictionary
todos.body: Table with three or four columns, label, value, frequency, dimension of the label (1 if one variable and 2 if pair of variables).

todos.title: Linear Discriminant Analysis
todos.body: Supervised clustering.  Bad technique because it assumes that clusters do not overlap and are well separated by hyperplanes.  Use density estimation techniques instead.

todos.title: Prescriptive
todos.body: Suggesting actions or decisions based on the descriptive and predictive analytics.

todos.title: Density Estimation in high dimensions
todos.body: Subject to dimensionality.  Instead use nonparametric kernel density estimators with adaptive bandwidths.

todos.title: Optimizing Web Crawlers
todos.body: Split crawling across 8,000 servers, run 20 copies on each server, change timeout thresholds, max size, blacklist of websites to ignore, avoid infinite loop with site lookup table.

todos.title: Hidden Decision Trees
todos.body: Scores large volumes of transactional data.

todos.title: K Means Clustering
todos.body: Produces circular clusters and not good for data points that are not a mixture of Gaussian distributions.

todos.title: Regression
todos.body: Predictive statistical tool using independent variables to predict a dependent variable.  Avoid linear regression. Best tools are to reduce number of variables and use constrained regression such as ridge, logic, or lasso regression.

todos.title: Metrics for Marketing
